## Validate.toQualifierIndex() function

Converts a number to a [QualifierIndex](./ts-res.qualifierindex.md) if it is a valid qualifier index.

**Signature:**

```typescript
export declare function toQualifierIndex(index: number): Result<QualifierIndex>;
```

the number to convert


</td></tr>
</tbody></table>
**Returns:**

Result&lt;[QualifierIndex](./ts-res.qualifierindex.md)<!-- -->&gt;

`Success` with the converted [QualifierIndex](./ts-res.qualifierindex.md) if successful, or `Failure` with an error message if not.
